Related repos

  • Manages ESP32 and ESP8266 boards from a browser
  • Firmware for ESP32 drone telemetry
  • ESP32 project that disrupts Bluetooth, WiFi, and RC signals on 2.4GHz using noise packets
  • Flash ESP-based firmware via browser
  • Universal serial interface for hardware hacking
  • ESP32 audio streaming software suite
  • Firmware for pranks on M5Stack ESP32 devices
